name: Mahindra Scorpio
description: The price of Mahindra Scorpio, a 7 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 13.59  - 17.35 Lakh. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 2184 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Manual. Scorpio comes with 2 airbags. Mahindra Scorpio has a ground clearance of 209 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 15.18 kmpl for Scorpio.

variants.variant_name: Scorpio S MT 7STR 2184 cc, Diesel, Manual, 130 bhp
